name: Gnome
description: Gnomes are magical folk created by gods of invention, illusions, and underground exploration. The earliest gnomes were seldom seen by other folk due to their penchant for living underground.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in Dim Light within 60 feet of you as if it were Bright Light, and in Darkness as if it were Dim Light. You discern colors in that Darkness only as shades of gray.

traits.name: Gnomish Cunning
traits.description: You have Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

traits.name: Gnomish Lineage
traits.description: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose one of the following lineages. You gain the 1st-level benefit of that lineage. When you reach 3rd level and 5th level, you learn a higher-level spell as shown below. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose when you select the lineage).

lineages.name: Forest Gnome
lineages.description: Forest gnomes are tied to the natural world

lineages.name: Rock Gnome
lineages.description: Rock gnomes are clever tinkers and inventors
lineages.notes: You learn both Mending and Prestidigitation cantrips.

ability_score_increases.notes_2024: In 2024 rules, ability score increases come from your Background, not your Species.
